channel.title: Tech
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from Tech, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Slackbot is an AI agent now
item.description: Salesforce unveils Slackbot, a new AI agent that allows users to complete tasks across multiple enterprise applications from Slack.

item.title: Hoka Coupon Codes: 10% Off | January 2026
item.description: Enjoy free expedited shipping or 10% off Hoka discount codes, plus save up to 30% with the best discounts this month.

item.title: Deepgram raises $130M at $1.3B valuation and buys a YC AI startup
item.description: Deepgram is raising its Series C round at a $1.3 billion valuation.

item.title: Apple launches ‘Creator Studio’ bundle of apps for $12.99 per month
item.description: The bundle includes access to Final Cut Pro, Logic Pro, and Pixelmator Pro on Mac and iPad, as well as Motion, Compressor, and MainStage on Mac.

item.title: What to Do If ICE Invades Your Neighborhood
item.description: With federal agents storming the streets of American communities, there’s no single right way to approach this dangerous moment. But there are steps y...

item.title: Everything You Need to Know About Importing a Chinese Smartphone
item.description: The top Chinese smartphones are innovation-packed spec beasts, but it’s not always a good idea to import from the East.

item.title: Superorganism raises $25M to back biodiversity startups
item.description: Superorganism launched in 2023 as what it claims is the first venture capital firm focused on biodiversity, aiming to serve as the conservationist on ...

item.title: Best Baby Gear (2026): Baby Monitors, Strollers, Crib Mattresses
item.description: From baby monitors and sound machines to smart bassinets and car seats, here’s the baby tech we’ve tested and recommend.

item.title: Trump Declared a Space Race With China. The US Is Losing
item.description: If you want to put people back on the moon, don’t gut the agency in charge of getting them there.

item.title: Brazil orders Meta to suspend policy banning third-party AI chatbots from WhatsApp
item.description: Brazil's competition watchdog has ordered WhatsApp to put on hold its policy that bars third-party AI companies from using its business API to offer c...
